prod_short_desc: Load up the Cargo Plane and get ready to fly!
prod_long_desc:
Get the LEGO® City Airport Cargo Plane ready for delivery, featuring a back hatch that opens, turning nosewheel, big engines and accessible cockpit, plus an airport service car with hand truck and space for 4 packages. Includes 2 minifigures.
Includes 2 minifigures: a pilot and an airport worker.
Features a cargo plane with a back hatch that opens, turning nosewheel, big engines and an accessible cockpit.
Also includes an airport service car with space for packages and a detachable hand truck.
Accessory elements include a walkie-talkie and 4 packages.
Use the hand truck to load the packages onto the service car.
Open the back hatch of the plane to load the packages in.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 5 and over.
Cargo Plane measures over 3” high, 9” long and 10” wide.
Airport service car measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
